value:
select 
claim_num,
claim_desc,
src_sys_cd,
accident_desc,
inspection_desc,
dim_claim_key,
actv_rec_ind,
max_sid
from 
(
select 
src.claim_num,
src.claim_desc,
src.src_sys_cd,
src.accident_desc,
src.inspection_desc,
src.dim_claim_key,
src.actv_rec_ind,
LKP_MAXSID.max_sid,
row_number()over(partition by src.claim_num order by src.rec_crt_dtm desc) as row_cnt
from (
select 
cast ('axis' as varchar(10)) as src_sys_cd,
cast(A.NSINIES as varchar(35)) as claim_num,
cast(A.TSINIES as varchar(4000)) as claim_desc,
cast('' AS varchar(255)) inspection_desc,
CAST(A.TNTFREF AS varchar(500)) accident_desc,
cast(B.dim_claim_key as integer)dim_claim_key,
cast('Y' as char(1))as actv_rec_ind,
1 as dummy,
a.rec_crt_dtm
from CDP_STG_DWH.sisaxis_siniestros A
left join 
(select dim_claim_key,claim_num from cdp_dwh.dim_claim_t where src_sys_cd='axis') B
on A.NSINIES=B.claim_num)SRC
left outer join
(select 1 as dummy, max(claim_txt_key) as MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.claim_txt_t) LKP_MAXSID
on src.dummy = LKP_MAXSID.dummy) where row_cnt=1
